title: Chris Bosh on Redeem Team, mental toughness, and pressure
description:
Chris Bosh won it all during an illustrious basketball career - including an Olympic gold medal and two NBA titles. In an honest and open chat, Chris talks about how to have fun at an elite level, tips on staying grateful, and how supporting can sometimes be more challenging than leading. 

"We have to sacrifice to be a part of a team. I don't care what team you're on."
